mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_service_tb (user_id, title, request, request_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT cs.id ,cs.title,u.user_name ,cs.request_time FROM customer_service_tb cs JOIN user_tb u ON cs.user_id = u.id ORDER BY cs.id DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT cs.id,u.id as user_id ,cs.title,u.user_name,cs.request,cs.request_time ,cs.response,cs.response_time FROM customer_service_tb cs JOIN user_tb u ON cs.user_id = u.id WHERE cs.id = #{id} ORDER BY cs.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_service_tb SET response = #{response}, response_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
